channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Live: UEFA European Qualifiers Football
channel.desc: Stephen Watson presents live coverage of Northern Ireland's 2026 World Cup qualification match against Germany. The four-time World Cup winners host Michael O'Neill's side in Cologne. Can the underdogs defy the odds? Live coverage, expert insight and all the action from the first minute to the final whistle. Kick-off is at 7.45pm.
